columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the record was created

columns.name: OAuthAppId
columns.description: The unique  identifier for the app as assigned by Microsoft Entra ID

columns.name: ServicePrincipalId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the service principal instance of the application in the tenant

columns.name: AppName
columns.description: The application's display name as exposed by the associated service principal

columns.name: AddedOnTime
columns.description: Date and time when the application was registered

columns.name: LastModifiedTime
columns.description: Timestamp when the app was last modified

columns.name: AppStatus
columns.description: Status of the app; can be: Enabled, DisabledByMicrosoft, DisabledByAppGovernancePolicy, DisabledByUser, Deleted (information for apps with Deleted status is only available for 30 days since the app was deleted)

columns.name: VerifiedPublisher
columns.description: Specifies details about the verified publisher of the application which this service principal represents. It includes information such as: DisplayName, VerifiedPublisherId, AddedDateTime

columns.name: PrivilegeLevel
columns.description: The privilege level of the app based on the highest classified permission granted to the app

columns.name: Permissions
columns.description: Contains an array of permission objects; each permission object includes PermissionName, TargetAppId, TargetAppDisplayName, PermissionType, PrivilegeLevel, UsageStatus

columns.name: ConsentedUsersCount
columns.description: Count of users who have consented to the app; this information is only available when the app isn't admin consented

columns.name: IsAdminConsented
columns.description: Value is True if a user has provided admin consent to the app on behalf of all the users in the org, otherwise the value is False

columns.name: AppOrigin
columns.description: Specifies whether the app is internal to the organization or registered in an external tenant

columns.name: LastUsedTime
columns.description: Date and time when the app was last used

columns.name: AppOwnerTenantId
columns.description: Specifies the ID of the tenant where the app was registered
